Reviews.Title: Not perfect, but a great purchase as an "extra" computer
Reviews.Author: M. D. Tilley
Reviews.Content: Great buy!  The description was accurate: the battery life is short (about one hour), and it runs rather slowly, and does NOT run internet video well. Yes, those are downers.  But for an affordable laptop, it's terrific!  It plays DVDs fine, and it's perfect as a second or third computer.  Happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: NEVER AGAIN!!!!.....
Reviews.Author: Kyri Rose
Reviews.Content: No! At least I learned my lesson. I'll be buying brand spanking new computers from here on out elsewhere. Certain computer keys were not working and the charging adapter got too hot and it only charges up to 67%. New rule, don't get anything from anything that borders Mexico, it's very scheming people and offers. Only thing I will buy from amazon are the games that they sell used or new. I didn't even want to give it a star.

Reviews.Title: Lab To[
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Leffew
Reviews.Content: Cannot wait to have my husband open this up on Christmas day. Already logged in and it is very easy to use

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: Patrick Jackson
Reviews.Content: The quality and the condition of this laptop is awesome. Also the battery life for the age of it is incredible. I wish that I had of bought two. One for work and the other for play.

Reviews.Title: Great netbook
Reviews.Author: Alison C.
Reviews.Content: This netbook is perfect for school. Can't even tell its a netbook because the resolution is so good. Battery lasts awhile

Reviews.Title: Apple iBook Laptop, G4 iBook
Reviews.Author: Ann Nguyen "bookann"
Reviews.Content: It works fairly well, considering the value price. Occasionally Safari does freeze, but generally the speed is fine. All program works well. The Windows Media Player does take awhile to load. Besides that, everything works splendidly.

Reviews.Title: apple laptop
Reviews.Author: william tiemann
Reviews.Content: this is the first laptop i bought and i just love this one. its so easy to use. it might be a little heavier than a notebook but you can do much more with it. the company i bought it from is first rate too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Will do business again!
Reviews.Author: Wacobill
Reviews.Content: Excellent! Above and beyond! I thought I had a problem but I didn't!This man fixed me up with a great attitude! Love'em! Will do businessagain!

Reviews.Title: its a good buy
Reviews.Author: oscar g.
Reviews.Content: i got this laptop and like it but just wasnt for me i say if u like a good small loptop i say get this it is a nice peace of equipment

Reviews.Title: great for an ibook g4
Reviews.Author: L,I,B,E,R,T,Y,
Reviews.Content: but It has a powermac processor rather than the intel required for many applications. It does what I need though, which is to play music from iTunes.

Reviews.Title: Amazing value
Reviews.Author: Taylor
Reviews.Content: Very good computer for the price. Not made for gaming, or current flash, but email, facebook, 2009 office, and shopping work very well. Very good computer!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Every now and then it freezes, but besides that, everything works fine. THe valued price I paid for the item is so worth it

Reviews.Title: Works like a charm
Reviews.Author: Purplecow
Reviews.Content: Product arrived faster than expected, and booted up right out of the box.  The book was a little worn, but less than I expected. The charger broke in two days, but still works and are cheap to replace. The new battery works great. I bought this as a way to try out a mac system, and now I will be looking to buy a newer and faster OS. After using the iBook for a while, I am very pleased with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Money well wasted
Reviews.Author: Lil'pretty
Reviews.Content: Total waste of money my ibookg4 showed up all scratched up , it works well but doesn't any of the stuff I want it to do the screen shuts off about every 10 minutes or so. Very annoying when I'm trying to work. Wish I hadn't spent my hard earned money on something I will probably just let my 9 year old destroy.

Reviews.Title: WORST QUALITY IBOOK EVER
Reviews.Author: nancy
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED MY IBOOK G4 TODAY IT IS THE WORST BECAUSE I CANNOT CONNECT TO NOTHING.. I CANNOT CONNECT TO ITUNES IT WANT LET ME DO NOTHING BEWARE OF WHAT YOU BUY I AM NOT SATISFIED PLUS IT DIDNT COME WITH A RECOVERY DISK I FEEL LIKE MY MONEY WAS WASTE DOWN THE DRAIN,... THEY SAID YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.. I BOUGHT SEVERAL THING FROM AMAZON NO PROBLEM AT ALL BUT THIS IBOOK G4 SUCKS SUCKS SUCKS... I CANT LOG ON NOTHING................ THIS IS WORST EVER THING I EVER BOUGHT....

Reviews.Title: Good little computer
Reviews.Author: Jald84
Reviews.Content: Wife and I bought these, for his and her computers for traveling etc. We were originally going to get netbooks, but decided to go with the older iBooks. Best decision we could have made. These things, are faster then netbooks of CURRENT age. They do everything a netbook does, just faster. For an older laptop, they hold up very well for there age!

Reviews.Title: Expected more.
Reviews.Author: Carol L.
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished because I had never owned a Mac and wanted to see if I would like it.  It will not download any version of Adobe Player, so I can't watch any internet videos on it (which the seller knew, because I called them), and a couple of months after I got it, the back light quit working.  Truthfully, the screen is too small anyway (my fault for buying it) but now that it doesn't light up, it is extremely hard to read.  It was really a waste of my money - glad it wasn't more.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for school use
Reviews.Author: Student
Reviews.Content: I wanted a laptop to use for my online college classes.  I was a bit nervous after reading the reviews for the ibook G4, but decided to take a risk since it was an apple for $100.  It's great! Due to the processor being powerPC based (not intel duo), I decided to use the browser tenfourfox.  The internet speed is fine, and the pages load relatively quickly.  It's obviously not as fast as a brand new computer, but I can't believe how fast it is! So far I have been able to use it for everything I bought it to do.  I understand it's not good for gaming, or perhaps watching youtube.  That was not the basis for my decision as those were not things I needed.  I highly recommend this product for anyone that needs a laptop for school/internet useage.  It's been a great buy!I bought it from Technoid, and it is used but in very good shape.  Just some smudges and some scratches (barely).  The battery has lasted a long time on its first charge.  The product came packaged well, in good condition, and although I expected shipping to take a week, I bought it on Friday- and it arrived on Monday! Definite bonus!

Reviews.Title: Worst laptop, vendor and service
Reviews.Author: Mayra
Reviews.Content: When I bought this laptop and i got it home it was nothing like the picture. Extremely old, scratches every where and awful. Wasn't very happy but since it was for my daughter and he mainly uses it for Facebook I let it slide. Worked fine for two months then all of the sudden stopped working after only a month and a half. When contacted the seller I was first told to send it back cause they were going to fix it. Then, after waiting for a week with no answered, call the seller and the same person who advice me to mail it then said he couldn't do anything about it. He was not going to fix either return or credit the money. So basically i lost over $200 just like that.Do not get anything from this people. Don't keep buying products from them and keep them in business. They deserve no star at all.

Reviews.Title: Ehhh
Reviews.Author: Bev
Reviews.Content: Everything is good. Just wish it was more updated, I can't even watch Netflix on it because it doesn't have the correct updated Firefox, or anything.

Reviews.Title: Facts left out
Reviews.Author: jv
Reviews.Content: The computer works fine but if I knew that Apple and others like ATT no longer support the IBook G4 I would not have bought it.  I do not recall anything in the product description regarding this. Cannot download certain upgrades like Flashpoint.  Cannot do certain things on ATT's website. etc.

Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: Bat
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter and it was very dirty when I opend the box which would have been okay but as she was using it for the first time the screen is constanty freezing or the screen is turning blue and she is unable to use it. So no it just sits here not being used it was a waste of my money and a big dissapointment to my daughter.

Reviews.Title: Super price.. works great.
Reviews.Author: Dj FS
Reviews.Content: Very very Good laptop.... it is a PPC so..you will have to deal with the problems but Overall..its Great. Items that actually arrive was the cable to charge it.. the computer itself.. not the other stuff shown in the pictures. Arrived on time.

Reviews.Author: awesomeness347
Reviews.Content: I love the....who am i kidding i love ALL Mac products.The people are so nice and helpful.I would only shop from them.

Reviews.Title: Two referbished Apple Lap Tops
Reviews.Author: George A. Grubb "g_grubb"
Reviews.Content: Apple iBook Laptop, G4 iBook 1.33GHz Processor, 1GB, 40GB, 12.1" 1024x768 Display, Combo Drive ,WiFi, 56K Modem ,10/100 Ethernet , Bluetooth, OS X 10.5 installed, Refurbishedby AppleThis product was in excent condition and was what I expected, Customer service is excellent!

Reviews.Title: i like the mini.
Reviews.Author: R. Bozzuto
Reviews.Content: The funny things with Mac is like any electronic they have a bad side.  On mine I enjoy what you can do with images and using the commands does have some nice things to it.  On the downside my machine only works with Firefox I've tried to download Chrome,Opera and Safari none of the latter work though.  It won't download Firefox updates so I'm not sure if thats a software glitch or what.  Netflix wont work on the mini either.  It seems to be read as if its downloading to an ipod which it says when I attempt to download. Something Apple must've overlooked. Adobe or Flash(?) don't even ask!Ive had a G4 that I took the guts out of it so I know now first hand all the Mac has going for it is that its glorified IBM nothing more.  I now know the real Mac and I scoff when I see people act like nothing EVER goes wrong with Mac hardware.  Please give it a rest already! The Mac mini is built by Intel so I guess Mac is now officially a PC.

Reviews.Title: Interesting!
Reviews.Author: Jennie T. Vander Helm
Reviews.Content: I am a PC person but wanted to expand my knowledge to Apple computing.  I must say they are similar but extremely different at the same time.  I had to buy me a book for dummies.  It is a slow learn but enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: Apple iBook G4 1.33 GHz Processor
Reviews.Author: Eric Ossip
Reviews.Content: Everything is great, just wish Turbotax still used Mac this old...had to use another laptop for that purpose. And so the story goes onward.

Reviews.Title: My Ibook is Idle
Reviews.Author: mark jumper
Reviews.Content: It appears to be good but it is locked out from recieving updates due to a password still in place that should have been taken out,so its sitting idle n cant recieve new updates to use it well,can someone contact us to clear that out? send email back on this please,thx

Reviews.Title: the computer is ok
Reviews.Author: janeya butler
Reviews.Content: I give them a review of 5 stars because the customer service was 100% and I will buy something else from them, the computer was ok its a little slow, but it works for my 10yr old daughter and it was a great price

Reviews.Title: sons happy
Reviews.Author: april krogermeier
Reviews.Content: Keys on the keyboard don't work, this was not listed in the description. I also bought a webcam, but, my son can't download Skype. We bought a usb keyboard, and that took care of that issue. My son is beyond thrilled with it.

Reviews.Title: I brought one for my sister she love it!
Reviews.Author: Michael McCray
Reviews.Content: For the money it's the best. Word great I wish I brought 2. She's the last person I know to get a Facebook account.

Reviews.Title: you get what you pay for..
Reviews.Author: Andre Bissey
Reviews.Content: Got this as a Christmas gift. Definitely old style laptop..aka heavy. But it was designed to be fairly rugged. Pros. Nice screen size, lots of features, DVD player works. Loaded with lots of cool programs. Cons. SLOW!! Compared to my newer tablets and laptops. I have Hi speed wifi. And I cant play YouTube or netflix videos. Its like watching something with an old school dial up connection! Battery seems to drain quickly. I did have to restart it once, but now seems to work ok. Still on the fence if I'm going to keep or send back.

Reviews.Title: Excellent deal
Reviews.Author: Mamadou Diallo
Reviews.Content: The item is exactly how it was describe. I love it and i hope to buy more in the future.

Reviews.Title: It's not working as expected. I hate it... Totally different as i was expecting ...
Reviews.Author: Shahid Qureshi
Reviews.Content: It's not working as expected. I hate it... Totally different as i was expecting ... I will never think to buy that... Waste of money!!!

Reviews.Title: Small and very heavy to carry around.
Reviews.Author: BadgalNiles
Reviews.Content: I brought this laptop last year 2012 on amazon because i was looking for cheap apple laptop. This  laptop is very heavy for me and the battery inside not good. It run out fast and it needed to be plugged on a charge while using.  It doesn't let you download nothing and it asks for password, it has a 1999 system. I regret buying this laptop and I've wasted my money on it.  Think twice before you purchase it ☆

Reviews.Title: The Poisoned Apple
Reviews.Author: Don "Don"
Reviews.Content: To say that "You get what you pay for" would be an understatement. I understand that the computer was older, but this thing was crap. The Ethernet cable port doesn't even work.  When I am able to get it to connect to the internet (only with wifi), it often takes awhile to perform basic tasks...Facebook is a nightmare on this thing; I spend half my time waiting for the spinning beach ball of stupidity to stop turning. Honestly, I should have bought a PC.

Reviews.Title: I did not expect it
Reviews.Author: mohammed
Reviews.Content: The laptop is very slowly .Also,it needs more care ,I would like to return that laptop because I did not get any benefit.

Reviews.Title: Apple iBook Laptop g4, 1gb, 40gb
Reviews.Author: Efua
Reviews.Content: Got it as a gift for my boyfriend. He wanted a computer for personal use. I think it worked fine, he just needed to restore it. I think the only thing that sucks is that he can't update the iTunes ....

Reviews.Title: BAD !!
Reviews.Author: Chantal
Reviews.Content: The laptop I bought was used and they used paint to cover up the blemishes. I tried to give it away, but even the other people saw the mishap of the appearance and didn't buy it. I would have returned it, but I opened it too late. I would never buy this product ever again ONLINE. I would probably prefer to shop on ebay if this may continue to happen when I purchase something from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Amazon Ivy
Reviews.Content: Let me start by saying nothing against AMAZON I have been a customer for years now. And I know that this is an older mac. I just feel I was mislead in the description given. Meaning that this iBook G4 I purchased from DR Bargains has a lot more issues and I am pissed off. Luckily my boyfriend is a mac wiz and was able to get me the right updates and I had to get a new hard drive. So now I have everything I need for my school work. But I was just completely annoyed by this situation and this person had the nerve to ask me not to put any negative comments!! Well guess what its going up! And I will not be purchasing from you again!

Reviews.Title: lacking
Reviews.Author: taylor ingram
Reviews.Content: the product i received was not what i ordered it is not a generation 4 i book but a generation 1 running ios 10.3 not 10.5 as listed. overall I'm very dissatisfied with the service and the false descriptions.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: Gloria Tucker
Reviews.Content: Not as up to date as I would have liked, but otherwise nice! The laptop doesn't hold a charge for very long, but that's to be expected.

Reviews.Title: Great travel Mac
Reviews.Author: David W. Dippel
Reviews.Content: For anyone looking for a solid computer for processing and backing up travel photos and sending emails, this is a sturdy, reliable computer. It's not flashy, but it does what you need without the worry of attracting the wrong type of interest in a public place. Older Macs are not as slim or light, but they survive on the road. And, bringing back useful photos and keeping in touch happens just as well with an IBook.

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: Clint Robinson
Reviews.Content: I guess I just didn't do enough research but this is a very old school laptop. I took it to the local computer shop and they couldn't even put any new operating systems on it. The company was really easy to work with, however, I ended up getting the computer a few days early and it was an easy and quick return. The company was awesome, just not the product I was looking for

Reviews.Title: Not the right fit
Reviews.Author: Kim E. Kennedy
Reviews.Content: Purchased this lap top for my younger son (12) to do homework and play games.  Way too slow for him to go on the internet.

Reviews.Title: Great deal!
Reviews.Author: chanuvette
Reviews.Content: Item in good condition, we'll kept, with all accessories included. I would definitely recommend to a friend ( and I have)!

Reviews.Title: My Apple Ibook I LIke it.
Reviews.Author: Yvonne Valentin
Reviews.Content: I bought this Apple iBook Laptop for my daughter for Christmas -  and so far it works great and we have had no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: happy
Reviews.Author: ladybug
Reviews.Content: I brought this for my 13 year old son and he loves i just wish it had a web cam so now I half to order him a web cam

Reviews.Title: Buying a used product should always be this good!
Reviews.Author: Willy Legagneur "maafa2001"
Reviews.Content: I receive MY macbook got started right away and loving it. I took my unit to my cousins home for him to look at it.  He says the unit is in fantastic condition and loaded with great software.

Reviews.Title: BUYER BEWARE
Reviews.Author: mark twiz "shaboika"
Reviews.Content: Simply horrible. I purchased this laptop for my mother and it didn't last even 2 months before the screen started flickering upon opening. That being the case, I told my mother to leave the computer open and plugged in (the battery pack quality was also unacceptably low. Laptop wouldn't last even a minute without the adapter connected). Thought I found a loophole in the cheap computer, but leaving it open made no difference. Tossed the computer 2 weeks ago. Too bad I can't give this 0 stars. Word of advice, keep looking.

Reviews.Title: Hi
Reviews.Author: gabriela
Reviews.Content: I could not do anything with that laptop for not having the username and password to access, send it to me please

Reviews.Title: Simply Horrible
Reviews.Author: Varg
Reviews.Content: The performance of this computer is comparable to that of a terminally ill sloth. It takes irritatingly long amounts of time to load web pages, and often it will stall when you attempt to scroll. You can't stream something while being in another tab. The battery life eventually regresses to a pathetic 20 minutes approximately. It even makes its own lethargic sounds.

Reviews.Title: Good mac
Reviews.Author: Smooth
Reviews.Content: Its a solid computer, might need to up the speed but overall very nice an clean. I am looking for another for myself

Reviews.Title: MINOR PROBLEMS BUT GOOD ENOUGH FOR ME
Reviews.Author: Alex
Reviews.Content: I will start off with that the iBook looks better than I was expecting it to be. It works fine, although I have to mention a few points:- Combo drive did work for the first time; later it quit working while my DVD was in it. I could give it back for repair, but I can live with it. I cannot afford to lose more of my precious college time when I have to prepare a presentation for 35 people (I always can attach external DVD, may I need to) After all, it's 7 years old.- Although the bottom of the LCD case is loose, it does not interfere with my work on the iBook.-RAM is 768MB, not 1GB. I don't mind.- I got a cheap replacement adapter (on AMAZON for 8 dollars) in the box BUT it is long and way more comfortable that original APPLE charger- The battery was dead after half an hour but it's minor; I will use my old one from my broken Apple PowerBook if it will fit.Overall for 212.00 pretty good APPLE.

Reviews.Title: Ew.......
Reviews.Author: Movie Whiz
Reviews.Content: The laptop didn't actually close properly, it was stained badly, and the battery died completely after only having it a few months. Thanks guys!

Reviews.Title: old laptop
Reviews.Author: KATHLEEN
Reviews.Content: its old and broke twice so old it cant be fixed what a waste of my money wish I could return it ?

Reviews.Title: Super great!!
Reviews.Author: C. Reep
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my granddaughter to use for college and she absolutely loves it.  Has everything she needs for her assignments plus even extras.  Can't afford a new Apple so this was perfect for her needs.  Came in excellent condition (looked just like new) and everything worked.  She's pleased, I'm pleased and my pocketbook is pleased.  This is the 2nd one I have purchased from Discount Mac (bought one for hubby cause he just likes to surf and wanted something that's fast)  and I 100% recommend Discount Mac to anyone that's looking for an Apple at a great price.

Reviews.Title: I could not return it.
Reviews.Author: cabbieiam
Reviews.Content: To begin with, I should have never purchased it, but it looked fine on the net.Althpugh they send me a larger screen unit and a more power full chip as well as larger drive,it still did not function at all.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: mellina
Reviews.Content: I ordered this product for my daughter, and she is very pleased with it eventhough I received it late due to some posting error which was corrected immediately, making me regret on my previous low rating.....:(

Reviews.Title: Its alright
Reviews.Author: nina
Reviews.Content: Sent a free case which was nice, but the only thing it does is facebook and emails. doesnt download any simple programs or software.

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: This is a very good lap top though its few years old .arrived on time reasonably prices .i am really happy about this product

Reviews.Title: Worked fine but was a little slow for me.
Reviews.Author: lorna  coppola
Reviews.Content: It was in great condition but it was older than the one I had before and I'm having trouble finding a printer that will work with it.

Reviews.Title: apple laptop
Reviews.Author: letha thomas
Reviews.Content: it wont let me download any thing ughhhhh.i really wish i could trade it in for something with a web cam..

Reviews.Title: apple  all over
Reviews.Author: barrie
Reviews.Content: a bit of a rip off if you do not know that apple has changed their operating sistum  and it is little more than a toy

Reviews.Title: Ehh...
Reviews.Author: Dtay
Reviews.Content: It definitely did not meet my expectations. There were certain problems with it that I couldn't deal with so I will be reselling it soon.

Reviews.Title: Luna 2
Reviews.Author: lulu
Reviews.Content: Ok is not bad at all thanks for all . I hope you can help in the future  good bye.

Reviews.Title: not satistfied
Reviews.Author: sj
Reviews.Content: slow slow slowwwww,my frist apple product and am not abt to continue with them am sticking to andriods and htc products

Reviews.Title: Lap top
Reviews.Author: Dreese
Reviews.Content: The lap top did not meet my needs it was for my son the battory % would go down quickley it wouldn't stay enough for him to do what he needed.

Reviews.Title: I would purchase again
Reviews.Author: LaTasha Richardson
Reviews.Content: This laptop was a little older than I had anticipated, but I was still pleased with the fact the the description of the product was accurate. It was in very good condition for the age of the laptop, and it came earlier than I was actually told that it would arrive.I would purchase from this seller again.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY
Reviews.Author: whitewolf
Reviews.Content: I ordered this a few days ago. Shipping was fast, that part I did like. Got it today.  But the computer is crap. Too slow and can't update a few things. No return label or papers like proof of purchase. It's too slow for games or anything else. NOT HAPPY with this. I will be shipping this back!!!! and want a refund!!!  First time I ever ordered something from Amazon that I did NOT like.

Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: I took it to the Geek squad  at Best Buy,to transfer info from another mac,  they said it was faulty, they even sent it to their factory and didn't have the part to fix it,,so bought one fron eBay.

Reviews.Title: Nice laptop!
Reviews.Author: D. Oslund "Read More"
Reviews.Content: I have an iPad, but there are times when I need a laptop.  I have always used Apple products and am very pleased with this refurbished Apple G4.  The first one I received had some non-working keys, and after contacting Amazon, the dealer answered my email immediately.  Another laptop arrived in two days with a prepaid mailing label to return the first one.  So far, the replacement is working great and is in excellent "physical condition." I am pleased with this purchase and the price.

Reviews.Title: Apple iBook
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel Bamisile
Reviews.Content: I love the product. It works like new. Thank you. I thought it will not worth it, but alas, it came clean with no scratches at all. The DVD player works perfect. Everything looks great.

Reviews.Title: ehh
Reviews.Author: tabitha etherington
Reviews.Content: Never restored to factory settings and no disc's to do so myself it won't hold charge when not plugged in

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: short last time is what I don't like. The package is good though. SLOW. owner is nice. I kept it but I want return it. I regret having waste money on it.

Reviews.Title: Hey just three stars for functioning five stars for shipping for shipping
Reviews.Author: Jose Morales
Reviews.Content: One it doesn't have a gig chip as I got 512. that's about it doesn't function as well as the first one Because I have problems uploading photos otherwise it's okay I gave five stars for shipping it you got to me even earlier than you said.

Reviews.Title: Good computer
Reviews.Author: Maestro64
Reviews.Content: When you can find one that works the way it is supposed to, this is a great buy. Despite its age, my son loves his

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: A good laptop. I just wish they would have said it doesn't upgrade pass a point. I can't update my phone because of it. It's only use is for emails and web search.

Reviews.Title: Love apple but didn't like this
Reviews.Author: nancy
Reviews.Content: To old couldn't up date it and it only worked for about 2 mo and then would power on anymore!

ProductInfo.Features:
AIM PowerPC Processor 1.33GHz
256MB DDR RAM
60GB Hard Drive
12.1-Inch Screen, ATI Mobility Radeon 9200
Apple Mac OS X 10.4 (Tiger)
ProductInfo.Name: Apple iBook Laptop, G4 iBook 1.33GHz Processor, 1GB, 40GB, 12.1" 1024x768 Display, Combo Drive ,WiFi, 56K Modem ,10/100 Ethernet, Bluetooth, Mac OS X 10.4 (Tiger)
